function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of implementation of precautionary measures in health club facilities","Impact":"Increase in the risk of pandemic propagation","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of precautionary measures, regular monitoring, and compliance checks","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, sensors, biometric access control systems","People":"Occupants of health club facilities","Owner":"Health club management"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of health club facility risks in relation to pandemic propagation","Impact":"Increased likelihood of outbreaks and transmission within the facility","Mitigation":"Education and training of staff, communication of guidelines to members, and regular risk assessments","Technologies":"Online training modules, communication software, risk assessment tools","People":"Staff, members, and visitors of the health club facilities","Owner":"Health club management, training and education providers"},{"Description":"Inconsistent implementation of precautionary measures across modular health club facilities","Impact":"Unequal protection and increased risk of propagation in some facilities","Mitigation":"Standardized protocols, centralized management, and regular audits and inspections","Technologies":"Centralized management software, IoT devices for monitoring, audit and inspection tools","People":"Occupants of modular health club facilities","Owner":"Central management, facility operators"}]}
